org.fit.cssbox.css
Class NodeSpec

java.lang.Object
  org.fit.cssbox.css.NodeSpec

public class NodeSpec
extends java.lang.Object

A node specification used in a selector. The simple selectors contain a single node specification, structured selectors contain multiple node specifications in some relation.

Author:
radek
